layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x50
  LayoutBlockFlow {test} at (0,0) size 800x50
    LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,16) size 800x18 [color=#008000]
      LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 404x18
        text run at (0,0) width 404: "This line should be green (there should be no red on this page)."
